p: A total of 101 (26.0%) patients required ICU admission and 56 (14.4%) died. In the multivariable analysis, age ≥75 years was associated with lower ICU admission (aOR 0.26, 95% CI: 0.14–0.48). The 65–74 years age group was not associated with ICU admission, but the statistical power was low (4%). Chronic liver disease was also associated with ICU admission ( Fig 1 and S1 Table).
